title: What are the national level exams for designing in India? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hi Sneha, Design exams in national level:— NIFT (www.nift.ac.in) National Institute of Fashion TechnologyNID (www.nid.edu)CEED ( www.gate.iitb.ac.in)PEARL (www.pearlacademy.com)Symbiosis (www.sid.edu.in)Srishti Institute of Art, Design and Technology (www.srishti.ac.in)AIEED ( www.aieed.com)These are national level exams catering to various feild of arts. Kindly go through all the respective give website address to get the in-depth details of each and everyone. All the best and go as per your interest of area.

National Institute of Fashion Technology has a common entrance exam National institute of Design is through CEED IIT design wing Mumbai or Guwahati These are three premier Design Schools of India Besides there are other specialised on Graphics, Automobile Design, MIT (pune ) and more .
